電動キックボードで快適な移動を体験しませんか？: Experience Comfortable Movement with Electric Kickboards
乗るカリは、沖縄の美しい海と歴史的な場所をもっと身近に感じ、観光客だけでなく地元: Norukari was born as a new mobility option to make Okinawa's beautiful sea and historical places more accessible. With ports spreading throughout the city, you can easily explore Okinawa's charm using just your smartphone.
乗るカリのポートは沖縄の人気スポットに数々広がっています。国際通りを中心に、空港: Norukari ports are located in popular spots in Okinawa. From Kokusai Dori to airports, downtown areas, convenience stores, and hotels, you can rent and return kickboards at your convenience using your smartphone.

アプリを開き、最寄りのポート(駐輪場)を選択し、お好きなキックボードを選択します: Open the app, select the nearest port (bike parking), and choose your favorite kickboard.
QRコードで読み取り、キックボードの施錠の解除を行い、ライドを開始します。: Scan the QR code, unlock the kickboard, and start your ride.
ライド後は、お近くのポートに返却し写真を撮影し、返却が完了となります。: After the ride, return the kickboard to a nearby port, take a photo, and the return process is complete.
※エリア関係なく全国同一の料金となります。: ※ The fee is the same nationwide regardless of the area.
※ご利用後はアプリ内にて料金を確認いただきますようお願いいたします。: ※ Please check the fee in the app after use.
※モビリティを返却すべきとされている場所以外の場所（但し、駐停車禁止区域を除く。: ※ If the kickboard is returned to a location other than the designated area (excluding no parking zones), a penalty of 30,000 yen (tax included) will be charged.
ポートは那覇市を中心にポートのエリアが拡大中！現在、合計40ヶ所点在しています。: Ports are expanding in the central area of Naha City! Currently, there are a total of 40 ports. (As of March 2024)
ポート設置にご興味のある法人さまへ: For Corporations Interested in Port Installation
那覇市を中心に、ポートの設置を募集しております。設置費用・維持コストは一切かから: We are recruiting for port installations mainly in Naha City. You can start by placing ports in spaces such as shops, buildings, and apartments at no installation or maintenance cost. It contributes to easy movement, monetization of dead spaces, and attracts customers to your shop.
